title: Build Your Own Night of Television, Plus an Interview With ‘Russian Doll’ Director Leslye Headland | The Watch (Ep. 328)
description:
We build our ideal night of network television from a landscape of streaming comedies and network dramas (2:50). The director of ‘Russian Doll,’ Leslye Headland, joins the show to talk about her personal inspirations for the show (39:50) and creating the loop timeline (52:58).

Host: Chris Ryan
Guests: Alison Herman, Andrew Gruttadaro, Leslye Headland

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
